Description: Environmental consultant fees -- flood hazard assessment + wetland assessment update + AEPA interface + regulatory coordination
Notes: Professional assessment; regulatory coordination; AEPA interface. Per FP-17 and DF-07.

Description: AEPA Water Act application fee -- regulatory application for construction near waterway/wetland
Notes: If required for construction near waterway/wetland. AEPA approval PENDING (DEP-3505-E06). Priced as ALLOWANCE per FALLBACK_POLICY because fee schedule uncertain.

Description: ABWRET-A wetland replacement fee -- in-lieu fee payable to Government of Alberta upon Water Act approval
SourceRef: Datasheet.md > Wetland/Waterbody Characteristics > ABWRET-A Wetland Replacement Fee ($10769.54 per Wetland Assessment Executive Summary Ghostpine Aug 2021)
Notes: Exact fee calculated in Wetland Assessment: $10769.54. Rounded to $10770 per ROUNDING=DOLLAR. Not payable until Water Act approval issued.

Description: Erosion and sediment control plan preparation -- engineering design + monitoring plan per Alberta ESC guidelines
Notes: Engineering design + monitoring plan. Per Alberta ESC guidelines.

Description: Development permit fee -- flood fringe approval component (Town of Penhold)
Notes: Application fee for development permit with flood fringe conditions. Penhold fee schedule TBD. Priced as ALLOWANCE per FALLBACK_POLICY.
